document_data.name: ''Faithbreaker''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Faithbreaker''''' was a [[magic]]al [[warhammer]] associated with the [[cult of the Absolute]].<ref name=BG3">
document_data.Description: While the handle of the hammer had the typical notches that were associated with the rank of its [[hobgoblin]] owner, ''Faithbreaker'' featured another, more notable marking. Its leather handle was stamped with a brand in the shape of a hand.<ref name=BG3" />
document_data.Powers: The warhammer possessed a ''+1 [[item enchantment|enchantment]]''. It allowed its wielder to channel the power of [[the Absolute]].<ref name=BG3" />
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, it was in the possession of the [[True Soul]] leader [[Dror Ragzlin]].<ref name=BG3" />
